Detailed Description

All LUT Parameters.

struct vpsissldcLutCfg

Field Documentation

uint32_t vpsissldcLutCfg::address

Read address for mesh offset table, must be 16 byte aligned

vpsissldcLutDownScFactor_t vpsissldcLutCfg::downScaleFactor

Defines the downsampling factors used for the mesh offset tables, Note that down scaling factor (ISSHAL_LDC_LUT_DOWN_SCALE_FACTOR_1) is not valid for the RAW capture.

uint32_t vpsissldcLutCfg::lineOffset

LDC Mesh table line offset, must be 16 byte aligned
